title: News View :: The World On Arirang
text: K-pop sensations BTS are holding the first of three concerts at Jamsil Olympic Stadium in Seoul today.Seoul is the final stop on their 'Love Yourself' world tour which began in August 2018 and took the band to the U.S., Europe, Saudi Arabia and other places around the globe.Fans around the world can also pay to watch the concert live online.The concert will be held twice more in Seoul, on the 27th and 29th of October.The operator of SRT high-speed trains is doubling the number of late night tickets for the three days that the concerts are held, so fans from other parts of the country can get back home.
description: 한국을 대표하는 글로벌 방송! The World On Arirang!
